Generation II.Gold: Anyone who takes even one bite of Blissey 's egg becomes unfailingly caring and pleasant to everyone.
Generation II.Silver: It has a very compassionate nature. If it sees a sick Pok é mon , it will nurse the sufferer back to health.
Generation II.Crystal: Biting into one of the delicious eggs that Blissey provides will make everyone around smile with joy.
Generation II.Stadium 2: Anyone who takes even one bite of Blissey 's egg becomes unfailingly caring and pleasant to everyone. (Pokémon Red, Silver, or Crystal inserted) It has a very compassionate nature. If it sees a sick Pok é mon , it will nurse the sufferer back to health. (Pokémon Blue, Gold, or Yellow inserted)

Generation III.Ruby: Blissey senses sadness with its fluffy coat of fur. If it does so, this Pok é mon will rush over to the sad person, however far they may be, to share an egg of happiness that brings a smile to any face.
Generation III.Sapphire: Blissey senses sadness with its fluffy coat of fur. If it does so, this Pok é mon will rush over to the sad person, however far they may be, to share an egg of happiness that brings a smile to any face.

Generation III.LeafGreen: Anyone who takes even one bite of Blissey 's egg becomes unfailingly caring and pleasant to everyone.

Generation IV.Diamond: This kindhearted Pokémon nurses sick Pokémon to health. It senses feelings of sadness.
Generation IV.Pearl: It is a Pokémon that delivers happiness. Eating its egg is said to make one kind to everyone.
Generation IV.Platinum: The eggs it lays are filled with happiness. Eating even one bite will bring a smile to anyone.
Generation IV.HeartGold: Anyone who takes even one taste of Blissey 's egg becomes unfailingly caring and pleasant to everyone.

Generation VII.Sun: Even the most ferocious Pokémon become calm when they eat Blissey's egg, which is said to be filled with happiness.
Generation VII.Moon: Its fluffy fur coat acts as a sensor, enabling it to read the feelings of people and Pokémon.
Generation VII.Ultra Sun: Their eggs are such a delicacy that some say eating one will bring you happiness. These eggs fetch the highest prices on the market.
Generation VII.Ultra Moon: This Pokémon is overflowing with love. Only Chansey that share a strong bond with their Trainer can evolve, so people say.

Generation VIII.Sword: Whenever a Blissey finds a weakened Pokémon, it will share its egg and offer its care until the other Pokémon is all better.
Generation VIII.Shield: Blissey lays mysterious eggs that are filled with happiness. It's said that anyone who eats a Blissey egg will start acting kindly to all others.
Generation VIII.Brilliant Diamond: This kindhearted Pokémon nurses sick Pokémon to health. It senses feelings of sadness.
Generation VIII.Shining Pearl: It is a Pokémon that delivers happiness. Eating its egg is said to make one kind to everyone.
Generation VIII.Legends: Arceus: A kindhearted Pokémon that will care for any sick person or Pokémon until their health improves. The eggs it lays are delicious and bring good fortune to those who eat them.

Generation IX.Violet: The eggs it lays are filled with happiness. Eating even one bite will bring a smile to anyone.
